- Use **`RMarkdown`** to create documents tying everything together



## R Markdown {.smaller}

- **`R`** version of **`Markdown`**
- **`Markdown`:** Stripped down version of markup -> html
- Can embed `chunks of r code`
- Allows to you to weave **text**, **`code`** and **r output** together 
- Outputs to **wide variety of formats**
